Cornelius Adam Igbudu (1914-1981) bu onye ozioma nke Naijiria hibere Anglican Adam Preaching Society (A.A.P.S), otu ndi ozioma na Churchka Anglican nke Nigeria.
Enyere ya ikike ibibi nsogbu ahu ike.

Nabofa dere akwukwo gbasara ndu ya nke a kporo: "Adam: The Evangelist".
Na May 1998, Profesor Sam U
Erivwo dere na Cornelius Adam Igbudu bu onye Bishop Agori Iwe ji "na oke nkwanye ugwu".
